tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NuclearEnergyDatabase (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensitive_data VARCHAR(255),
    encryption_key VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE nuclear_energy_database_administrators (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE security_audits (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(255),
    audit_date DATE,
    findings TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE encryption_keys (
    key_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    key_name VARCHAR(100),
    key_value BLOB,
    created_by VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Nuclear_Audit_Logs ( 
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    user_id INT NOT NULL, 
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Nuclear_Users(user_id) 
);
